title: Researchoo
author: Researchoo
content: Bitcoin go to Zero bitcoin going to moonbitcoin going to 1m$ bitcoin will hit 250K$ do you think its Good or knowledge able discussion?offcourse Noso what next ? Make Money without waiting by your skills its good and long term investment That all ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: If you are tried of Bitcoin discussion then you should try avoiding Bitcoin boards, Bitcoin topics and to even give you are better option avoid the forum completely.This is a Bitcointalk forum and yes Bitcoin will be discussed here always. Speaking of skill there are various ways or skills you can have in connection to Bitcoin or Crypto-currency in general that will be beneficial for you.

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: I don't understand, are you having issues with Bitcoin price predictions threads and topics. Or Bitcoin discussion altogether Because from my observation it seems like its the former. And if so, Bitcoin discussion in the forum isn't limited to price prediction. There are different board to cater for various aspects Technical and economical are not excluded.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: BIT-BENDER on February 23, 2025, 06:49:07 PMIf you are tried of Bitcoin discussion then you should try avoiding Bitcoin boards, Bitcoin topics and to even give you are better option avoid the forum completely.This is a Bitcointalk forum and yes Bitcoin will be discussed here always. Speaking of skill there are various ways or skills you can have in connection to Bitcoin or Crypto-currency in general that will be beneficial for you.You @op are the one who doesn't understand how bitcoin works. Bitcoin is a volatile asset, so it is very normal for investors who derive benefits from their investments in bitcoin to speculate the price of bitcoin at any point when there is a news or anything that might influence the price of bitcoin. I would have agreed with you if bitcoin was a stable asset whose price doesn't need to be talked about all the time.This is a forum for users to discuss everything about Bitcoin, including it's price. Therefore, you should learn to get used to it because you definitely would need the information to help you put up good strategies on when to buy, sell and hodl further.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quotedo you think its Good or knowledge able discussion?offcourse NoPeople discuss their interest, whether it is knowledgeable or not, as long as people enjoy what they are discussing it is out of our concern.  If you are tired of reading this kind of discussion then help yourself and avoid such topics.  This way you won't be seeing these kind of discussion and avoid frustrating yourself.Quoteso what next ? Make Money without waiting by your skills its good and long term investment That all ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️I agree that one should take advantage of one skill.  Being idle and not using our skills is a waste of opportunity.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: The truth is, nobody knows shit. Bitcoin may go to zero or a million next year nobody knows that but with every passing day bitcoin stays above $0, the chances of $1 million happening is getting stronger. That’s the only thing I know about what’s going on.Don’t get too obsessed with the current pricing. Have a long term plan and keep DCA’ing. In 3-5 years you’ll thank yourself.If you think about the prices too much, you’ll make mistakes that’ll cost you serious money.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: serjent05 on February 23, 2025, 07:14:47 PMQuotedo you think its Good or knowledge able discussion?offcourse NoPeople discuss their interest, whether it is knowledgeable or not, as long as people enjoy what they are discussing it is out of our concern.  If you are tired of reading this kind of discussion then help yourself and avoid such topics.  This way you won't be seeing these kind of discussion and avoid frustrating yourself.Quoteso what next ? Make Money without waiting by your skills its good and long term investment That all ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️I agree that one should take advantage of one skill.  Being idle and not using our skills is a waste of opportunity.And some people want advice and even a prediction. It can be annoying but onlyso if you let it annoy you.Its a public forum, the registered members drive the topics, we have choices toeither visit a thread, read through it and/or respond to it.Not all threads are about price prediction, there are technical boards for the OPif they really feel like they want a more "useful" discussion.

comments.author: Patikno
comments.body: Quote from: Researchoo on February 23, 2025, 06:38:38 PMBitcoin go to Zero bitcoin going to moonbitcoin going to 1m$ bitcoin will hit 250K$ do you think its Good or knowledge able discussion?offcourse NoYou can't think of a discussion as a bad thing, especially if it discusses Bitcoin. If you feel it is not necessary to discuss then you should ignore it and try to see the board related to what you want. I actually feel that people who don't want to discuss Bitcoin are people who will not be successful in the future, and most of these people are people who don't have a good understanding of Bitcoin, so they think that discussing Bitcoin is not important. But in reality, people who discuss Bitcoin are usually smart, rich, and know about the future of Bitcoin, so they don't get bored talking about it, some of them are like Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, Michael Saylor, Changpeng Zhao, Donald Trump, Robert Kiyosaki and many others. They even discuss Bitcoin price predictions, so if you feel the discussion is unnecessary, then I think you need to reconsider it.

comments.author: Solodoski
comments.body: Quote from: Researchoo on February 23, 2025, 06:38:38 PMbitcoin will hit 250K$ so what next ?Make Money without waiting by your skills its good and long term investmentdo you go to a soccer center and expect to hear preaching and conversations that is not related to sports?  this is a bitcoin forum and it is just normal to see bitcoin related topics along the different prices bitcoin get to. those topics are more rampant at the speculation board and less on other board, if you care less about it, it is just simply to zoom off that board. people creating those topics might even be more skilled in different areas than you are.

comments.author: jstyler
comments.body: Its not that i disagree with you but i think we need to distinguish between speculation and actual projects, if someone's asking about a legit project that could potentially reach 250k$ i think its worth discussing.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Researchoo on February 23, 2025, 06:38:38 PM~do you think its Good or knowledge able discussion?Well, heres an idea that might help. This is an online forum, right? So if you have an idea for an interesting discussion, why don't you start one yourself?

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Quote from: Researchoo on February 23, 2025, 06:38:38 PMBitcoin go to Zero bitcoin going to moonbitcoin going to 1m$ bitcoin will hit 250K$ You have to remember that Bitcoin is a speculative asset now, and so there will be a lot of discussions about it's price movement. So don't be surprised by those prediction, and if you are not aware of, we have a full board here: Speculation.Quote from: Researchoo on February 23, 2025, 06:38:38 PMso what next ? Make Money without waiting by your skills its good and long term investment That all ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️That's what you call passive income. You accumulate Bitcoin overtime and wait for it to grow in the bull run. And yes, it's better to go and DCA and slowly building up your portfolio and look for the bigger picture. As it is the best method to make money. Of course you can also trade short term, but you need skills and capital and it's not very easy for beginners.

comments.author: Hazink
comments.body: You are getting tired of something that's like a culture, like it or not; such threads will always be active on both the Bitcoin discussion board and speculation because such speculation always comes out from time to time, and people are curious, which makes them ask questions to get the idea and think of others, which they share the same vision for, and also from critics who hate the development.

comments.author: hero_the_bossman
comments.body: If you don't like it, you leave it.Do and learn things that inspire you, OP

comments.author: ABCbits
comments.body: I think many of us don't like repetitive topic. But at least it's not as bad as as thread promoting ponzi or shilling certain project with claim it'll rise 1000X. For OP, why don't you try create non-shit thread?P.S. My second sentence refers to OP's feedback.

comments.author: jcojci
comments.body: You don't have to joining in the discussion if you don't like it. It is free for all people especially those who want to gather the information that they need it.If you want to make money, you must have skill and improve that so you will see how big your chance to make money from Bitcoin is. If you think you can not do that, leave like that and search for other things to help you to make money. No one forces you to stay in this forum.It will depend on your decision. If you think you don't get anything from this forum, you can leave it without hesitation. You don't need staying in this forum anymore especially if you don't interest with Bitcoin.

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.body: Quote from: ABCbits on February 24, 2025, 09:08:31 AMI think many of us don't like repetitive topic. But at least it's not as bad as as thread promoting ponzi or shilling certain project with claim it'll rise 1000X. For OP, why don't you try create non-shit thread?P.S. My second sentence refers to OP's feedback.OP just didn't see how he can realize the potential from BTC, thus, it's "shit".It's a question of whether OP would be still ignorant of BTC's ways or not.

comments.author: TTTbtc626
comments.body: Quote from: Researchoo on February 23, 2025, 06:38:38 PMBitcoin go to Zero bitcoin going to moonbitcoin going to 1m$ bitcoin will hit 250K$ do you think its Good or knowledge able discussion?offcourse Noso what next ? Make Money without waiting by your skills its good and long term investment That all ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Bitcoin is not going to zero. It is just consolidating. Go read some price analysis (like this one https://timetotrade.eu/bitcoins-next-move-breakout-rally-or-deeper-pullback/) or some expert insights.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Quote from: Researchoo on February 23, 2025, 06:38:38 PMBitcoin go to Zero Bitcoin is dead has been called hundred of times and Bitcoin isn't dead now in 2025, 16 years since Genesis Block.https://99bitcoins.com/bitcoin-obituaries/https://bitcoindeaths.com/If after watching "Bitcoin is dead" charts, you feel more ironically and want to know more, you can read those posts.https://bitcoindeaths.com/posts/Quotebitcoin going to moonbitcoin going to 1m$ bitcoin will hit 250K$ Since 2009, Bitcoin reached moon many times because Moon prices are different cycle by cycle.

comments.author: Mrbluntzy
comments.body: No body really gives a fuck about what you think, you can not stop bitcoinist from speculating about price, if you are a disciplined and a quiet investor that hates discussing price, you can bring up other valid interested and engaging discussions. But one thing I can assure you about is that speculation of Bitcoin price is really part of most Bitcoin investors, day and momentum traders.
